entry.title: [WAW1][Cooling System] - Rack W04B08

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 30, 08:00 - 10:00 UTC

Jul 7, 20:18 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Backbone offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 30/07/2025 08:00 UTC
End time: 30/07/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact: 2 hours of downtime for the customers using the DFW Local Zone.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on Backbone offer.

Thank you for your understanding.
